channel.title: My Neopets Scripts Part 1 (because the emptiness of this forum was bugging me)
channel.description:
Oh well. I got bored and decided to post here, to justify the existence of this board. Here are some scripts I made a while ago. They all [i]should[/i] still work, but I haven't tested them in a while.
NB: All my scripts won't fit, so I'll make a second topic and attach the rest there.
Also NB: VERY IMPORTANT. On all scripts, if you are encountering difficulty running them, change the window size to 800 x 600.

item.title: My Neopets Scripts Part 1 (because the emptiness of this forum was bugging me)

item.description:
@Plazftw wrote:

I tried the typing terror one it works thanks.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

the evil fuzzles script pwns! it detects 99.9% of the fuzzles and 100% of the mines when i use it. the only problem is i have to reboot my computer to end the script after it beat the game. is there a key or key combo i can press to make it end without having to do that? [br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 12:40:47 PM[/size][hr]nvm my previous question. also, just one of these scripts alone gets me 3k NP per day

Read full topic
